SHINY.ROUTER 0.2.0

Attach 'router-hidden' class to single page UI content

attach_attribs.Rd

Covered UI types are Shiny/htmltools tags or tag lists and httml templates. In case of tag list (tagList) and html template (htmlTemplate) 'div' wrapper with 'router-hidden' class is added.

attach_attribs(ui, path)

Arguments

ui

Single page UI content created with proper html tags or tag list.
path

Single page path name. Attached to data-path attriubute.

Contents
